quotes.quote: The afternoon knows what the morning never suspected.
Home may be where the heart is but it's no place to spend Wednesday afternoon.
Nobody looks at the moon in the afternoon, and this is the moment when it would most require our attention, since its existence is still in doubt.
There is nothing so wrong in this world that a sensible woman can't set it right in the course of an afternoon.
There is still nothing in life as constant and as changing at the same time as an afternoon at a ballpark.
You cannot plant an acorn in the morning, and expect that afternoon to sit in the shade of an oak.
A dead afternoon in a dark bar was not the worst of fates.
A frozen daiquiri of a scorching afternoon is soothing. It makes living more tolerable.
The afternoon of a human life must also have a significance of its own, and cannot be merely a pitiful appendage to life's morning.
Time pulses from the afternoon like blood from a serious wound.
Mornings belong to whatever is new. The current composition. Afternoons are for naps and letters.
Never draw more in the morning than you can erase in the afternoon.
The afternoon is not only the middle of the day it is the time to complete our essential task and go ahead in life.
Be bright like the afternoon sun and let everyone who sees you feel inspired by all the great things you do. You have one life here on earth. Make it count in whatever way you can.
Are you stuck again on an afternoon with nothing to do? Start with your dreams, decide where you want to be and create a plan to reach there. Every little step will lead you closer to your destiny.
It is the end of a fine bronze-tinted afternoon with purple shadows and febrile scraps of cloud.
Leave me a smile just warm enough to spend a million golden afternoons in.
Good afternoon guys, just remember that no matter where you are right now focus and a positive mindset can lead you to where you want to be in life.

Sometimes I reminisce about the chances I missed on a dull afternoon. Then I remind myself that I am not here by accident and I can still have opportunities to own. I take up a wining attitude and win through the day.
Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best. Good Afternoon.
I would just like to mention Robert Houdin who in the eighteen century inventented the vanishing birdcage trick and the theater matinee - may he rot and perish. Good afternoon.
As you climb the ladder of success, check occasionally to make sure it is leaning against the right wall. Good Afternoon and Good Day!
You could get a simple idea one afternoon that could completely change your life. Great innovators just needed one idea to change everything. Keep striving and you will reach success.
Learning history is so easy but making history is so difficult. Make a history of yourself and make others to learn it! Good Afternoon!
Under certain circumstances there are few hours in life more agreeable than the hour dedicated to the ceremony known as afternoon tea.
If i was a dove i wud daily bring you peace. A sheep I would bring you miracles, an angel I would bring you love, but since I'm only human I can only wish you the best. Good afternoon.
Afternoons are hard. Mornings are pure evil from the pits of hell, which is why I don't do them anymore.
It is the still, yellow kind of afternoon when one is apt to get stuck in a dream if one sits very quiet.

You'd think with its meteorological history, that the English language could have thought up another greeting, wouldn't you? ' said Larry. 'It's perfectly preposterous to say 'good afternoon' on a day whose climatic conditions could make even Noah worry.
Yes; I remember Adlestrop— / The name because one afternoon / Of heat the express-train drew up there / Unwontedly. It was late June.
Summer afternoon— summer afternoon; the two most beautiful words in the English language.
Millions long for the immortality who don't' know what to do with themselves on a rainy Sunday afternoon.
At five in the afternoon. / It was exactly five in the afternoon. / A boy brought the white sheet / at five in the afternoon.
Each Friday afternoon, we tasted wines from across the globe and gleaned knowledge from the best instructors and guest lecturers from the wine industry.
The afternoon with my parents was a beautiful sunny day that began with a tour of the historic winery in the morning.
At the time of day when the afternoon draws close to twilight, my memory floats back to the pristine days of my childhood in the early 1980s.
During this late afternoons, the hot South African sun tinted the day with an ochre hue, as if to hint that the lounge was now sufficiently warmed for us to enjoy a leisurely afternoon in it.
What I most enjoyed about this afternoon tea sessions was it was a time when my grandfather would engage our inquisitive young minds in discussions about anything under the sun.
The afternoon tea tradition is something I hope to carry forward with my own children and perhaps my grandchildren someday.
That's the way we all feel about conservation— it won't come this afternoon, but we ought to get started this afternoon, if it's ever going to come.

A people without history. / Is not redeemed from time, for history is a pattern / Of timeless moments. So while the light fails / On a winter's afternoon, in a secluded chapel / History is now and England.
The morning cup of coffee has an exhilaration about it with the cheering influence of the afternoon or evening cup of tea cannot be expected to reproduce.
Bliss...as though you'd suddenly swallowed a bright piece of that afternoon sun and it burned in your bosom, sending out a little shower of sparks into every particle.
I felt like I could see and hear everything. When I crossed the finish line that afternoon, I felt glorious, like I was going to live forever.

Each day brings two low tides and two high tides, but not always at the same time. Low tide shifts forward approximately an hour each day, moving from morning to noon to afternoon to evening over a period of time.
There comes a time late in the afternoon when the light is just so and my circadian rhythms are at exactly at a certain point, when the only solid thought in my mind is to run.
The afternoon glow is brightening the bamboos, the fountains are bubbling with delight, the soughing of the pine is heard in our kettle.
In the afternoon we / returned the same way, / And had the picture in our minds of magnificent regions of space / and mountain not seen before.

Alone far in the wilds and mountains I hunt, / Wandering amazed at my own lightness and glee, / In the late afternoon choosing a safe spot to pass the night, / Kindling a fire and broiling the fresh-kill'd game, / Falling asleep on the gather'd leaves with my dog and gun by my side.

What vague, delicious dreams, / Born of this golden hour of afternoon, / And air balm-freighted, fill the soul with bliss, / Transpierced like yonder clouds with lustrous gleams, / Fantastic, brief as they, and, like them, spun / Of gilded nothingness!
However, football’s so hard it is almost a sin / Victory takes time / More than flipping a dime / If it were so easy why / Waste a Sunday afternoon.

Good mourning, good afternoon, good night / What have you done with your life? / Everybody time comes to be embraced by the light / You only scared to die when you ain't livin right, man / I'm puttin up a hellafied fight.	Good mourning, good afternoon, good night / What have you done with your life? / Everybody time comes to be embraced by the light / You only scared to die when you ain't livin right, man / I'm puttin up a hellafied fight.

Tell me what am I supposed to do / While you got me sitting here waiting on you / Baby hurry hurry come back / And give me some lovin' this afternoon / And give me some lovin' this afternoon / 'Cause I can't wait to see you smile / Could you stay a little while / And do the things that only lovers do.
Good afternoon baby / I sure missed you while I was gone / But you know I got to work honey / Hey, let's just do something later on.
Good mornin', good afternoon / Summer's in the rear, now we crafting tunes / Imagine how many stacks to relax the goons / Who be after that harvest that done lapsed in June.
